title: Nursing Students' Adaptation Support and Professional Identity Formation Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of nursing or related field experience
context.additional_context: Educational environment enabling learners, as general citizens, to expand their social roles based on understanding of nursing professions.

learning_goals: Learners can explain role expectations and academic requirements as nursing students with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can solve three or more practical scenarios by utilizing collaborative learning strategies with peer learners.
Learners can categorize stages of professional identity formation into three or more phases through feedback processes with instructors.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
